cinthria.description: Welcome to the town of Cinthria!

prison-vault.long_description: This is a place to store prisoners in the city of Cinthria. You have no idea why you're here. Maybe there's a way to get out...

initial_state.human_readable_description: A large, old wooden door with an inconspicuous keyhole. It is locked and unlocks if key_001 is inserted into the keyhole.

unlock.name: unlock
unlock.human_readable_description: Unlocks the door if a key is used

initial_state.human_readable_description: A flammable doormat next to the door. A key is concealed underneath.

burn.name: burn
burn.human_readable_description: Sets the doormat on fire if exposed to a flame
burn.function: lambda self: self.update_state({"is_burned": True, "key_hidden_under": False}) if self.state["is_flammable"] else None

lift.name: lift
lift.human_readable_description: Reveals the key hidden under the doormat

initial_state.human_readable_description: The only light source in the room, burning brightly with plenty of fuel. It can be moved or snuffed out.

move.name: move
move.human_readable_description: Allows the torch to be picked up or repositioned

initial_state.human_readable_description: A key hidden under the doormat. This is key_001.

reveal.name: reveal
reveal.human_readable_description: Makes the key visible and available

pick_up.name: pick_up
pick_up.human_readable_description: Adds the key to the playerâ€™s inventory

temple-in-cinthria.short_human_readable_description: A sacred temple with ancient carvings on the walls.

market-square.short_human_readable_description: (not-implemented) A bustling market filled with merchants.
